title: The Herd Saturday Special Podcast: 03/02/2019
itunes:title: The Herd Saturday Special Podcast: 03/02/2019
description:
Colin talks with former NFL Scout and 3 & Out podcast host John Middlekauff about Kyler Murray being undersized and Dwayne Haskins as an NFL Prospect.  Plus, they discuss why the 49ers are a potential landing spot for Odell Beckham Jr in this exclusive podcast.

Learn more about your ad-choices at https://www.iheartpodcastnetwork.com

See omnystudio.com/listener for privacy information.
